docs.title: Breach List Database
docs.text: A meta-database collecting resources that compile lists of (security) incidents

docs.title: Thematic Breach Lists
docs.text:
• AI
  • When Your AI Becomes a Target: AI Security Incidents and Best Practices
  • OWASP Top 10 for Agentic Apps - ASI Agentic Exploits & Incidents Master List
  • Caching - Scott Piper's Security Incidents From Caching
  • Cloud
    • Chris Farris' breaches.cloud
    • Cloud Service Providers - CloudVulnDB
    • ramimac's AWS Customer Security Incidents
    • S3 Bucket Leaks - nagwww's s3-leaks
  • Cryptocurrency
    • magoo's Blockchain Graveyard, blocksec-incidents
    • Defi Llama
  • Destroyed by Breach - Adrian Sanabria's Destroyed by Breach tweet
  • Identity based attacks - Push Security
  • Ransomware
    • RansomLook
    • Ransomware.live
  • Stegonography - lucacav/steg-in-the-wild
  • Supply Chain
    • CNCF's Supply Chain Security Compromises
    • OpenSSF's Catalog of Supply Chain Compromises
    • tstromberg's OSS Supply Chain Attack Compendium
  • Machine Learning - MITRE Adversarial ML Threat Matrix Case Studies
  • -2015 Repository of Industrial Security Incidents
  • -2010 Web Hacking Incident Database

docs.title: Generic Breach Lists
docs.text:
• Wikipedia List of Data Breaches
  • Wikipedia List of Security Hacking Incidents
  • Have I Been Pwned's Pwned Websites
  • Foobarsec
  • Data Breach DB paper
  • Privacy Right Clearinghouse
  • CSIS's Significant Cyber Incidents
  • CSIDB
  • Board Cybersecurity Incident Tracker (8-Ks)
